title.narrative: Number of counties that have established a county-township-village population health information system [Anhui]
Number of THCs / CHCs that have established primary care health information systems [Fujian]

Number of prefectures that manage Type II diabetes patients using the integrated NCD service package (Threshold value for a prefecture to qualify as using the integrated service package is 25% of tota
Number of prefectures achieving integration (at least of the management) of the health insurance schemes, thereby allowing unified payment arrangement for all providers

actual.value: All Prefectures thanks to the integration at the national level

title.narrative: Proportion of hospital discharges paid through case-based payment for all county-level public general hospitals and TCM hospitals
Proportion of labor based service revenue in total service revenue for all public hospitals in the province
Proportion of total Registered Physicians (assistant physician) and Registered Nurses practicing at the primary care facilities
Proportion of inpatients to be treated through standardized clinical pathways at county level public general hospitals
Out-of-pocket payment as portion of the total inpatient services expenditure
Number of hypertension patients that are under standardized management

Number of counties that have public disclosure of quality report (e.g. ALOS, drug revenue as a proportion of hospital revenue, expenditure per visit for outpatient, expenditure per admission for inpat
Proportion of outpatient care delivered by primary care facilities
Proportion of patients hospitalized within county
Growth rate of medical service revenue of public hospitals in the entire province
Average length-of-stay for county level public hospitals
The integration of the management of the three health insurance schemes at the provincial level in Fujian is undertaken
The county IDS system has been scaled up to at least 50 counties/districts in Anhui
